sqlMap.select: SELECT 'SpeedNum' as Code,'超速报警' as Type, Count(1) as Number FROM bi_iaa_vehicle_speed WHERE StartDatetime>=#startDate# And EndDatetime<=#endDate# UNION SELECT 'TireNum' as Code,'疲劳驾驶' as Type,Count(1) as Number FROM bi_iaa_vehicle_tired where StartDatetime>=#startDate# And EndDatetime<=#endDate# UNION SELECT 'OvertimeNum' as Code,'超时停车' as Type,COUNT(1) as Number FROM bi_iaa_vehicle_overtime where StartDatetime>=#startDate# And EndDatetime<=#endDate# UNION SELECT 'localeNum' as Code,'进出地点' as Type,COUNT(1) as Number FROM bi_iaa_locale_inout where IntoDatetime>=#startDate# And OutDatetime<=#endDate# UNION SELECT 'AreaNum' as Code,'进出区域' as Type,COUNT(1) as Number FROM bi_iaa_area_inout where IntoDatetime>=#startDate# And OutDatetime<=#endDate# UNION SELECT 'RoadNum' as Code,'路段偏离' as Type,COUNT(1) as Number FROM bi_iaa_road_inout where IntoDatetime>=#startDate# And OutDatetime<=#endDate#
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT UnitName, IFNULL(SpeedNum,0)as speedNum, IFNULL(TirNum,0) as TirNum, IFNULL(OvertimeNum,0)as OvertimeNum, IFNULL(RoadInoutNum,0)as RoadInoutNum, IFNULL(AreaInoutNum,0)as AreaInoutNum, (IFNULL(SpeedNum,0)+IFNULL(TirNum,0)+IFNULL(OvertimeNum,0)+IFNULL(RoadInoutNum,0)+IFNULL(AreaInoutNum,0)) as Total, 0 as AlarmNum FROM etta_basedata.bi_unit_info p1
LEFT JOIN (SELECT t2.UnitID,COUNT(1) as SpeedNum FROM bi_iaa_vehicle_speed t1 INNER JOIN etta_basedata.bi_vehicle_info t2 on t1.VehicleID=t2.ID WHERE 1=1
AND t1.StartDatetime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=t1.StartDatetime
GROUP BY t2.UnitID) p2 on p1.ID=p2.UnitID
LEFT JOIN (SELECT t2.UnitID,COUNT(1) as TirNum FROM bi_iaa_vehicle_tired t1 INNER JOIN etta_basedata.bi_vehicle_info t2 on t1.VehicleID=t2.ID WHERE 1=1
AND t1.StartDatetime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=t1.StartDatetime
GROUP BY t2.UnitID) p3 on p1.ID=p3.UnitID
LEFT JOIN (SELECT t2.UnitID,COUNT(1) as OvertimeNum FROM bi_iaa_vehicle_overtime t1 INNER JOIN etta_basedata.bi_vehicle_info t2 on t1.VehicleID=t2.ID WHERE 1=1
AND t1.StartDatetime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=t1.StartDatetime
GROUP BY t2.UnitID) p4 on p1.ID=p4.UnitID
LEFT JOIN (SELECT t2.UnitID,COUNT(1) as RoadInoutNum FROM bi_iaa_road_inout t1 INNER JOIN etta_basedata.bi_vehicle_info t2 on t1.VehicleID=t2.ID WHERE 1=1
AND t1.IntoDatetime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=t1.OutDatetime
GROUP BY t2.UnitID) p5 on p1.ID=p5.UnitID
LEFT JOIN (SELECT t2.UnitID,COUNT(1) as AreaInoutNum FROM bi_iaa_area_inout t1 INNER JOIN etta_basedata.bi_vehicle_info t2 on t1.VehicleID=t2.ID WHERE 1=1
AND t1.IntoDatetime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=t1.OutDatetime
GROUP BY t2.UnitID) p6 on p1.ID=p6.UnitID
'$unitIdList[]$'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) as RecordCount FROM (
) as temp
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT UnitName, VehicleNum, OnlineRate, NowOnlineRate, UploadRate, AlarmRate, ROUND( ( OnlineRate + NowOnlineRate + UploadRate + AlarmRate ) / 4 ) AS QualityRate FROM ( SELECT p1.UnitName, p1.VehicleNum, IFNULL(p2.OnlineNum, 0) AS OnlineNum, CASE WHEN p1.VehicleNum = 0 OR p2.OnlineNum IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ROUND( p2.OnlineNum / p1.VehicleNum * 100 ) END AS OnlineRate, IFNULL(p3.NowOnlineRate, 0) AS NowOnlineRate, 0 AS UploadRate, 0 AS AlarmRate FROM ( SELECT t1.UnitID, t2.UnitName, COUNT(1) AS VehicleNum FROM etta_basedata.bi_vehicle_info t1 INNER JOIN etta_basedata.bi_unit_info t2 ON t1.UnitID = t2.ID
'$unitIdList[]$'
GROUP BY t1.UnitID ) p1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT UnitID, COUNT(1) AS OnlineNum FROM etta_basedata.bi_vehicle_info WHERE ID IN ( SELECT VehicleID FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT VehicleID FROM bi_hta_now_online_rate WHERE IsOnline = 1
AND AnalyseDate>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=AnalyseDate
) AS temp ) GROUP BY UnitID ) p2 ON p1.UnitID = p2.UnitID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t2.UnitID, ROUND( SUM(t1.RealOnlineTime) / SUM(t1.TotalOnlineTime) * 100 ) AS NOwOnlineRate FROM bi_hta_vehicle_online_rate t1 INNER JOIN etta_basedata.bi_vehicle_info t2 ON t1.VehicleID = t2.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AnalyseDate>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=AnalyseDate
GROUP BY t2.UnitID ) p3 ON p3.UnitID = p1.UnitID ) AS tempData
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) as RecordCount FROM (
) as temp
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT t3.UnitName, t2.PlateNumber, t1.TotalOnlineTime, t1.RealOnlineTime, ROUND(t1.OnlineRate * 100) AS OnlineRate, t1.AnalyseDate, t1.Remark FROM bi_hta_vehicle_online_rate t1 INNER JOIN etta_basedata.bi_vehicle_info t2 ON t1.VehicleID = t2.ID INNER JOIN etta_basedata.bi_unit_info t3 ON t2.UnitID = t3.ID WHERE 1=1
AND t1.AnalyseDate>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=t1.AnalyseDate
'$unitIdList[]$'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) as RecordCount FROM (
) as temp
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT p1.UnitName, p1.VehicleNum, IFNULL(p2.OnlineNum, 0) AS OnlineNum, CASE WHEN p1.VehicleNum = 0 OR p2.OnlineNum IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ROUND( p2.OnlineNum / p1.VehicleNum * 100 ) END AS OnlinRate FROM ( SELECT t1.UnitID, t2.UnitName, COUNT(1) AS VehicleNum FROM etta_basedata.bi_vehicle_info t1 INNER JOIN etta_basedata.bi_unit_info t2 ON t1.UnitID = t2.ID
'$unitIdList[]$'
GROUP BY t1.UnitID ) p1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT UnitID, COUNT(1) AS OnlineNum FROM etta_basedata.bi_vehicle_info WHERE ID IN (SELECT VehicleID FROM( SELECT DISTINCT VehicleID FROM bi_hta_now_online WHERE 1 = 1
AND CreateTime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=CreateTime
) as temp) GROUP BY UnitID ) p2 ON p1.UnitID = p2.UnitID
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) as RecordCount FROM (
) as temp
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT p1.UnitName, p1.VehicleNum, IFNULL(p2.OnlineNum, 0) AS OnlineNum, CASE WHEN p1.VehicleNum = 0 OR p2.OnlineNum IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ROUND( p2.OnlineNum / p1.VehicleNum * 100 ) END AS OnlinRate FROM ( SELECT t1.UnitID, t2.UnitName, COUNT(1) AS VehicleNum FROM etta_basedata.bi_vehicle_info t1 INNER JOIN etta_basedata.bi_unit_info t2 ON t1.UnitID = t2.ID
'$unitIdList[]$'
GROUP BY t1.UnitID ) p1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT UnitID, COUNT(1) AS OnlineNum FROM etta_basedata.bi_vehicle_info WHERE ID IN (SELECT VehicleID FROM( SELECT DISTINCT VehicleID FROM bi_hta_now_online_rate WHERE IsOnline = 1
AND AnalyseDate>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=AnalyseDate
) as temp) GROUP BY UnitID ) p2 ON p1.UnitID = p2.UnitID
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) as RecordCount FROM (
) as temp
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT AnalyseConditions, PlateNumber, count(1) AS Number, CONVERT ( ROUND( SUM(EndMileage - StartMileage) ), CHAR ) AS TotalMileage FROM bi_hta_vehicle_night WHERE 1=1
'$vehicleIdList[]$'
AND AnalyseConditions LIKE '%$analyseGroup$%'
AND StartDatetime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=EndDatetime
GROUP BY VehicleID
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) as RecordCount FROM (
) as temp

SELECT AnalyseConditions, count(1) AS Number, CONVERT ( ROUND( SUM(EndMileage - StartMileage) ), CHAR ) AS TotalMileage FROM bi_hta_vehicle_night WHERE 1=1
AND AnalyseConditions LIKE '%$analyseGroup$%'
AND StartDatetime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=EndDatetime
GROUP BY AnalyseConditions
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT AnalyseConditions AS AnalyseGroupsName, PlateNumber, Sum(TotalTime) AS TotalTime FROM bi_iaa_road_inout WHERE 1=1
'$vehicleIdList[]$'
AND AnalyseConditions LIKE '%$analyseGroup$%'
AND IntoDatetime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=OutDatetime
GROUP BY VehicleID
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) as RecordCount FROM (
) as temp

SELECT AnalyseConditions AS AnalyseGroupsName, Sum(TotalTime) AS TotalTime FROM bi_iaa_road_inout WHERE 1=1
AND AnalyseConditions LIKE '%$analyseGroup$%'
AND IntoDatetime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=OutDatetime
GROUP BY AnalyseConditions
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT AnalyseConditions AS AnalyseGroupsName, PlateNumber, DriverName, Sum(TotalTime) AS TotalTime, count(1) AS Number FROM bi_iaa_area_inout WHERE 1=1
'$vehicleIdList[]$'
AND AnalyseConditions LIKE '%$analyseGroup$%'
AND IntoDatetime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=OutDatetime
GROUP BY VehicleID

SELECT COUNT(*) as RecordCount FROM (
) as temp

SELECT AnalyseConditions AS AnalyseGroupsName, Sum(TotalTime) AS TotalTime, count(1) AS Number FROM bi_iaa_area_inout WHERE 1=1
AND AnalyseConditions LIKE '%$analyseGroup$%'
AND IntoDatetime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=OutDatetime
GROUP BY AnalyseConditions
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT AnalyseConditions AS AnalyseGroupsName, PlateNumber, DriverName, count(1) AS IntoNumber, count(1) As OutNumber FROM bi_iaa_locale_inout WHERE 1=1
'$vehicleIdList[]$'
AND AnalyseConditions LIKE '%$analyseGroup$%'
AND IntoDatetime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=OutDatetime
GROUP BY VehicleID
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) as RecordCount FROM (
) as temp

SELECT AnalyseConditions AS AnalyseGroupsName, count(1) AS IntoNumber, count(1) As OutNumber FROM bi_iaa_locale_inout WHERE 1=1
AND AnalyseConditions LIKE '%$analyseGroup$%'
AND IntoDatetime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=OutDatetime
GROUP BY AnalyseConditions
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT AnalyseConditions AS AnalyseGroupsName, PlateNumber, DriverName, Sum(TotalTime) AS TotalTime, count(1) AS Number FROM bi_iaa_vehicle_overtime WHERE 1=1
'$vehicleIdList[]$'
AND AnalyseConditions LIKE '%$analyseGroup$%'
AND StartDatetime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=EndDatetime
GROUP BY VehicleID
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) as RecordCount FROM (
) as temp

SELECT AnalyseConditions AS AnalyseGroupsName, DriverName, Sum(TotalTime) AS TotalTime, count(1) AS Number FROM bi_iaa_vehicle_overtime WHERE 1=1
AND AnalyseConditions LIKE '%$analyseGroup$%'
AND StartDatetime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=EndDatetime
GROUP BY AnalyseConditions
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT t3.AnalyseGroupsName, t4.PlateNumber, CONVERT ( ROUND( SUM( t1.EndMileage - t1.StartMileage )), CHAR ) AS TotalMileage FROM bi_hta_vehicle_mileage t1 INNER JOIN etta_basedata.bi_analysegroups_vehicle t2 ON t1.VehicleID = t2.VehicleID INNER JOIN etta_basedata.bi_analysegroups t3 ON t2.AnalyseGroupsID = t3.ID INNER JOIN etta_basedata.bi_vehicle_info t4 on t1.VehicleID=t4.ID WHERE 1 = 1
'$vehicleIdList[]$'
AND t3.AnalyseGroupsName LIKE '%$analyseGroup$%'
AND t1.StartTime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=t1.EndTime
GROUP BY t1.VehicleID

SELECT t1.VehicleID, t3.AnalyseGroupsName, t4.PlateNumber, t1.StartMileage, t1.EndMileage, ( t1.EndMileage - t1.StartMileage ) AS TotalMileage FROM bi_hta_vehicle_mileage t1 INNER JOIN etta_basedata.bi_analysegroups_vehicle t2 ON t1.VehicleID = t2.VehicleID INNER JOIN etta_basedata.bi_analysegroups t3 ON t2.AnalyseGroupsID = t3.ID INNER JOIN etta_basedata.bi_vehicle_info t4 ON t1.VehicleID = t4.ID WHERE 1 = 1
'$vehicleIdList[]$'
AND t1.StartTime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=t1.EndTime
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) as RecordCount FROM (
) as temp

SELECT COUNT(*) as RecordCount FROM (
) as temp

SELECT t3.AnalyseGroupsName, COUNT(DISTINCT t1.VehicleID) AS VehicleNum, CONVERT( ROUND( SUM( t1.EndMileage - t1.StartMileage )),CHAR) AS TotalMileage FROM bi_hta_vehicle_mileage t1 INNER JOIN etta_basedata.bi_analysegroups_vehicle t2 ON t1.VehicleID = t2.VehicleID INNER JOIN etta_basedata.bi_analysegroups t3 ON t2.AnalyseGroupsID = t3.ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND t3.AnalyseGroupsName LIKE '%$analyseGroup$%'
AND t1.StartTime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=t1.EndTime
GROUP BY t2.AnalyseGroupsID

SELECT * FROM (
) AS temp LIMIT #pageIndex#,#pageSize#
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT AnalyseConditions as AnalyseGroupsName,PlateNumber, count(1) AS Number, CONVERT( ROUND(SUM(TotalMileage)),CHAR) AS TotalMileage, SUM(TotalTime) AS TotalTime, COUNT( CASE WHEN TotalTime > TimeThreshold * 1.5 THEN 1 END ) AS SeriousTired FROM bi_iaa_vehicle_tired WHERE 1 = 1
'$vehicleIdList[]$'
AND AnalyseConditions LIKE '%$analyseGroup$%'
AND StartDatetime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=EndDatetime
GROUP BY VehicleID

SELECT VehicleID, AnalyseConditions as as AnalyseGroupsName, PlateNumber, StartDatetime, EndDatetime, TotalTime, TotalMileage, TimeThreshold, StartPosition, EndPosition, DriverName FROM bi_iaa_vehicle_tired WHERE 1 = 1
'$vehicleIdList[]$'
AND StartDatetime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=EndDatetime
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) as RecordCount FROM (
) as temp

SELECT COUNT(*) as RecordCount FROM (
) as temp

SELECT AnalyseConditions as AnalyseGroupsName, count(1) AS Number, CONVERT( ROUND(SUM(TotalMileage)),CHAR) AS TotalMileage, SUM(TotalTime) AS TotalTime, COUNT( CASE WHEN TotalTime > TimeThreshold * 1.5 THEN 1 END ) AS SeriousTired FROM bi_iaa_vehicle_tired WHERE 1 = 1
AND AnalyseConditions LIKE '%$analyseGroup$%'
AND StartDatetime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=EndDatetime
GROUP BY AnalyseConditions

SELECT * FROM (
) AS temp LIMIT #pageIndex#,#pageSize#
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT t1.AnalyseConditions as AnalyseGroupsName,t1.PlateNumber, count( CASE WHEN t1.SpeedType = '一般超速' THEN 1 END ) AS 'GeneralOverSpeed', count( CASE WHEN t1.SpeedType = '较严重超速' THEN 1 END ) AS 'SeriousOverSpeed', count( CASE WHEN t1.SpeedType = '十分严重超速' THEN 1 END ) AS 'VerySeriousOverSpeed', count(t1.VehicleID) AS Number, Sum(t1.TotalTime) AS TotalTime, CONVERT( ROUND(AVG(t1.AverageSpeed)),CHAR) AS AvgSpeed FROM bi_iaa_vehicle_speed t1 WHERE 1=1
'$vehicleIdList[]$'
AND t1.AnalyseConditions LIKE '%$analyseGroup$%'
AND t1.StartDatetime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=t1.EndDatetime
GROUP BY t1.VehicleID

SELECT t1.VehicleID, t1.AnalyseConditions as AnalyseGroupsName, t1.PlateNumber, t1.StartDatetime, t1.EndDatetime, CONCAT( t1.MaxSpeed, '(', t1.SpeedThreshold, ')' ) AS MaxThresholdSpeed, t1.AverageSpeed, t1.TotalTime, t1.SpeedType, t1.StartPosition, t1.EndPosition, t1.DriverName FROM bi_iaa_vehicle_speed t1 WHERE 1=1
'$vehicleIdList[]$'
AND t1.StartDatetime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=t1.EndDatetime
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) as RecordCount FROM (
) as temp

SELECT COUNT(*) as RecordCount FROM (
) as temp

SELECT AnalyseConditions as AnalyseGroupsName, count( CASE WHEN SpeedType = '一般超速' THEN 1 END ) AS 'GeneralOverSpeed', count( CASE WHEN SpeedType = '较严重超速' THEN 1 END ) AS 'SeriousOverSpeed', count( CASE WHEN SpeedType = '十分严重超速' THEN 1 END ) AS 'VerySeriousOverSpeed', count(1) AS Number, Sum(TotalTime) AS TotalTime, CONVERT( ROUND(AVG(AverageSpeed)),CHAR) AS AvgSpeed FROM bi_iaa_vehicle_speed t1 WHERE 1=1
AND t1.AnalyseConditions LIKE '%$analyseGroup$%'
AND t1.StartDatetime>=#startDate#
AND #endDate#>=t1.EndDatetime
GROUP BY t1.AnalyseConditions

SELECT * FROM (
) AS temp LIMIT #pageIndex#,#pageSize#
SELECT ID,AnalyseGroupsName FROM etta_basedata.bi_analysegroups
SELECT ID, UnitName FROM etta_basedata.bi_unit_info
